property.name: contentDocumentIDs
property.description: The IDs of the uploaded files. Store this value in a text collection variable.
property.label: Content Document IDs

property.name: formats
property.description: The accepted file types. Enter a comma-separated list of the file extensions that the user can upload. Defaults: .csv, .doc, .docx, .gif, .jpeg, .jpg, .pdf, .png, .rtf, .txt, .word, .xls, .xlsx, .zip
property.label: Accepted Formats

property.name: label
property.description: The text above the 'Upload Files' button.
property.label: File Upload Label

property.name: multipleFiles
property.description: Allow the user to upload multiple files (ex: {!$GlobalConstant.True}).
property.label: Allow Multiple Files

property.name: recordId
property.description: The ID of the record to associate the files with (ex: {!Case.Id} or {!NewLead.Id}).
property.label: Related Record ID

property.name: title
property.description: The tooltip to display when the user hovers over the component.
property.label: Hover Text

property.name: uploadedFileNames
property.description: The names of the uploaded files. Store this value in a text collection variable.
property.label: Uploaded File Names
